creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: celadon glaze vase, squat oval body with long cylindrical neck, chilong wraping around base of neck and rests on body of vase while looking up; ormolu base added in 19th century
markings: undecifered stamp at center underside base
title: Vase, one of a pair
